en.streakTooltip: Number of days you managed to keep your tree alive.

locationUsage.body: Bonsai uses Your Device's location to get information about the weather. Your location data is anonymous and there is no need to keep location turned on at all times as it will be remembered and stored securely on your device. This feature is entirely optional. Enjoy!

locationTurnedOff.body: You need to have your location turned on in order to get weather.
